action.msg: You types are always so resilient.
You "types?" What's that supposed to mean?
Shut up, scumbag! If I have to use some more power to achieve my goal, then I will! After that, things will get a lot more peaceful!
Here we go.
Hey dad, what's going on?
Huh? Pepper, you need to leave.
Did that pepper just call you dad?
It's a long story.
Huh? No it isn-
No, it is, isn't it Fever? A long, tragic story.
One where if you were to leave, that'd make Pepper here an orphan again.
Oh, yeah. I mean, I suppose if you have to take me in, you might as well do it now.
Of course, we'll miss you as you go back to space jail... but I guess we'll just have to live on without you...
It's a shame, but I guess such is the fate of the cruel, mean space police.
You guys think you're so funny, don't you...
Ugh, fine. I'll let you go for now. Only cause I don't wanna make a scene.
But watch yourself Fever, your days of being free are almost up.
That was super uncomfortable.
You know what else is going to be uncomfortable in just a second?
Okay, okay- I get it, I didn't tell you enough, I'm sorry.
But for now, let's just enjoy the night before it leaves.
Hey pepper, stick around with us for a bit. We'll buy you a burger or something.
Oh really? Thank you, dad!
What's a burger?
